name: Comfort Motion Technologies
overview: Comfort Motion Technologies, LLC (CMT) is continuing the development, prototyping and testing of the algorithms, software and imbedded firmware which will lead to commercialization of its Vehicle Seat Multi-Position Software that provides enhanced ergonomic benefits to vehicle drivers/operators, by making subtle automated changes in the seat position, redistributing the occupant’s body weight, while improving comfort and safety. Having already completed its feasibility study and initial algorithm development (in partnership with Rose-Hulman Ventures), CMT is ready to continue its development of the first vehicle seat software technology that enhances driver/operator comfort, safety and alertness and reduces overall fatigue.

external_links.title: Industry news - Comfort Motion Technology received patent for car seat software
